General.Name: Ligao Foods Co.Ltd
General.Description: Ligao Foods Co.Ltd together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, production, and selling of bakery and frozen baked foods in China. It offers cream, chocolate, fruit product, and snack food filling series. The company also provides cream series comprising of chocolate and mousse powder. In addition, the company offers fruit soluble series, such as concentrated fruit drink, fiber, sunflower jam, fruit melting, and juice beverage concentrate series, as well as snack food series. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
